eventtitle: Bakery Booth at Science Faculty Market
eventdesc: Discover our delicious bakery and high-quality beverages at affordable prices at the Science Faculty Market, Mahidol University. We serve faculty members, students, doctors, nurses, and staff from nearby government agencies like the Government Pharmaceutical Organization and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. Although our team faces the hot weather, every word of appreciation from our customers keeps us going strong!
